entry.sentence: `` I 'm not scared at all , either , '' Lilly explained with a weighty expression .

entry.sentence: The stem cell transplant did n't take long and was completely unspectacular .

entry.sentence: Under general anesthesia , a special needle was used to remove a certain amount of bone marrow-blood mixture from the donor 's iliac crest , from which the stem cells were later filtered out and purified .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (PP (IN Under) (NP (JJ general) (NN anesthesia))) (, ,) (NP (DT a) (JJ special) (NN needle)) (VP (VBD was) (VP (VBN used) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB remove) (NP (NP (DT a) (JJ certain) (NN amount)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NN bone) (JJ marrow-blood) (NN mixture)))) (PP (IN from) (NP (NP (NP (DT the) (NN donor) (POS 's)) (JJ iliac) (NN crest)) (, ,) (SBAR (WHPP (IN from) (WHNP (WDT which))) (S (NP (DT the) (NN stem) (NNS cells)) (VP (VBD were) (ADVP (RB later)) (VP (VP (VBN filtered) (PRT (RP out))) (CC and) (VP (VBN purified))))))))))))) (. .)))

entry.sentence: After this procedure was completed , Lilly was given the stem cells intravenously , which also did not take long .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (SBAR (IN After) (S (NP (DT this) (NN procedure)) (VP (VBD was) (VP (VBN completed))))) (, ,) (NP (NNP Lilly)) (VP (VBD was) (VP (VBN given) (NP (DT the) (NN stem) (NNS cells)) (NP (NP (NN intravenously)) (, ,) (SBAR (WHNP (WDT which)) (S (ADVP (RB also)) (VP (VBD did) (RB not) (VP (VB take) (ADVP (RB long))))))))) (. .)))

entry.sentence: After the transplantation , Lilly had to lie in the isolation tent again for a while .

entry.sentence: But brave as she was , she accepted her fate without grumbling and waved happily when her parents or grandparents appeared at the glass window .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (CC But) (SBAR (ADJP (JJ brave)) (IN as) (S (NP (PRP she)) (VP (VBD was)))) (, ,) (NP (PRP she)) (VP (VP (VBD accepted) (NP (PRP$ her) (NN fate)) (PP (IN without) (NP (NN grumbling)))) (CC and) (VP (VBD waved) (ADVP (RB happily)) (SBAR (WHADVP (WRB when)) (S (NP (PRP$ her) (NNS parents) (CC or) (NNS grandparents)) (VP (VBD appeared) (PP (IN at) (NP (DT the) (NN glass) (NN window)))))))) (. .)))
